items.sentence: Tom forgot his umbrella, so I lent him mine.
Tom asked me why I prefer French to English.
Tom entertained the children by tap dancing.
Tom is staying at a hotel not far from here.
Tom carries his knife with him all the time.
Tom tried to make me tell him Mary's secret.
We thought it wise not to continue our trip.
I could not solve this problem by any means.
I can not feel at home in a luxurious hotel.
The tree bent under the weight of the fruit.
Who can tell what will happen in the future?
A beautiful lake lay just beyond the forest.
As we dive deeper, the water becomes colder.
Would you be so kind as to shut that window?
You should know better now you are eighteen.
The sum of two plus three plus four is nine.
The reason for my absence is that I was ill.
There is a strong bond between the brothers.
We have no chance against those top players.
This machine can print sixty pages a minute.
